comment: He is a good professor and if you have any questions he responds right away. I would say that he is a tough grader, he knows what he wants to see in his discussions. The class isn't hard tho but if you don't like writing I would recommend you to take someone else. There are 2 essays, disscussion posts and a few quizzes. I would take this class

I took his class online and it was fairly easy. It consisted of Discussion posts, a few essays, and a few quizzes here and there that were super easy. I actually enjoyed this course because I thought it was super easy and I don't think he's a tough grader.

comment: Professor Downs was one of my favorite professors I've had so far! His lecture videos were usually entertaining and hilarious because he'd add memes which helped me follow along better. There's usually a weekly discussion along with a quiz. Make sure to know the material for the week because the quizzes will have a time limit of about 5 minutes.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: The class itself was easy, but he was such a tough grader. We have a module each week, with some readings and a quiz or discussion post. A midterm and a final, and a couple papers/presentations. He is very good at answering emails, which is good because this was an online course.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Downs is an awesome professor to have for an online course.He is so organized and response to email within 5 to 10 minutes if you need any clarifications.His set up stays the same throughout semester so you know what to expect each week!You'll have 1 assignment due every week, a lesson to go through, a chp. and maybe article to read.TAKETHISCLASS!

comment: The people that complain about this class are just lazy. Super easy and interesting course with only one assignment per week (discussion post, quiz, or paper). For the longer papers, you get two full weeks. Readings can seem a bit daunting, but you do not need to read everything. Gather the main idea & base your discussion in that.

comment: Professor was cool and really does care about his students. comment: Considering its an elective in a beginner global issues class, was not expecting the grading results I got. Amazing teacher, hes clear on his grading criteria. He grades good, just be detailed, explain, and check the rubric. Theres one book which tended to have information on the quizzes.
